ou - package ou
 
OUAnimatedObject - Class in ou
OUAnimatedObject forms the base class of all objects used in M250 which have a graphical representation in a microworld.
OUAnimatedObject() - Constructor for class ou.OUAnimatedObject
Constructor for objects of the abstract class OUAnimatedObject
OUColour - Class in ou
Extends java.awt.Color to include an improved toString() method and static colours BROWN and PURPLE.

OUDialog - Class in ou
